"Tell <S%H1696><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> to separate <S%H5144><s%> themselves from the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which they make holy <S%H6944><s%> to me, <S%H2490><s%> and that they not profane my holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%> I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"Tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H2233><s%> 'If anyone of all your seed throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> approaches the holy things, <S%H6944><s%> which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> make holy <S%H6942><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> having his uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> on him, <S%H5315><s%> that soul shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from before me. <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh.

<S%H2233><s%>"'Whoever of the seed of Aaron <S%H175><s%> is a leper <S%H6879><s%> or has an issue; <S%H2100><s%> he shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy things, <S%H6944><s%> until he is clean. <S%H2891><s%> Whoever touches <S%H5060><s%> anything that is unclean <S%H2931><s%> by the dead, <S%H5315><s%> or a man <S%H376><s%> whose seed <S%H2233><s%> goes from him; <S%H3318><s%>

<S%H5375><s%>"'They shall therefore follow my requirements, lest they bear sin <S%H2399><s%> for it, <S%H4191><s%> and die therein, <S%H2490><s%> if they profane it. <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh who sanctifies them. <S%H6942><s%>

<S%H2114><s%>"'No stranger shall eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy thing: <S%H6944><s%> a foreigner <S%H2114><s%> living with the priests, <S%H3548><s%> or a hired servant, <S%H7916><s%> shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy thing. <S%H6944><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man eats <S%H398><s%> something <S%H6944><s%> holy unwittingly, <S%H7684><s%> then he shall add <S%H3254><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part of its value to it, <S%H5414><s%> and shall give the holy thing <S%H6944><s%> to the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and to all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H376><s%> 'Whoever is of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or of the foreigners <S%H1616><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who offers <S%H7126><s%> his offering, <S%H7133><s%> whether it be any of their vows, <S%H5088><s%> or any of their freewill offerings, <S%H5071><s%> which they offer <S%H7126><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for a burnt offering; <S%H5930><s%>
